author: Rick Spilman
content:
We have posted extensively about the City of Adelaide. Click the link for the blow by blow of the move from Scotland to Australia.

http://www.oldsaltblog.com/?s=city+of+adelaide

author: JIM DALGLEISH
content: REGARDING THIS MATTER . THE SAILING SHIP CARRICK, THE PREVIOUS RNVR HEADQUARTERS WAS DESPATCHED TO ADELAIDE SOUTH AUSTRALIA FROM ARDROSSAN BY SHIP. THE CARRICK WAS FORMELLY THE CITY OF ADELAIDE.SHE IS NOW BEACHED AS FAR AS I KNOW IN THE PORT OF ADELAIDE. IT WOULD BE INTERESTING TO KNOW WHO PAID FOR THE TRANSPORT TO AUSTRALIA. REGARDS JIM DALGLEISH. MELBOURNE

author: Robert Jones
content: Is the Scottish Government aware of this project and if so who should be contacted in Edinburgh?
